item.title: 特朗普说，以色列在卡塔尔攻击哈马斯“不推进以色列或美国的目标”。
item.description: <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiigFBVV95cUxOODQ4Z2ZGYXQ5TkdDNWJ2ams5bVVzRG03cFB6Yi1xRkx6TE45TTRtWnZld0dLS fhyv09uvjcwwvitq2hcmxrnekxtctb3vvjzlxi1oeo2tkfqsmhmbmr5uzjnslhetmw0ykow0ykowsjfhrmrmrlegdpcmrqumrqmrqudfymqmrqudfymqmrqudfymwp1oxzesshg5vexer1nq？oc = 5 Target =“ _ blank”>以色列罢工针对卡塔尔的哈马斯'不推进以色列或美国的目标，”特朗普说＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmickfvx3lxtfa1vrkukm4sgraz0pdcu5iqvpettvpettvqcxvvvwkthwkthwkthwkthwwkthwhwhcxwdju VM5WWWJQCET0RM9MWTFJETRNQV9ZDXHSAZE3SKDXCTLPRLJEAMXTNFBSNKL2VTFTSDU0TS16EFFRY0P3SDDDDDDDDDDSGP5ZS1IEEF3ZW？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：以色列在卡塔尔进行攻击，目标哈马斯领导者＆nbsp; cnn 以色列空袭目标顶级哈马斯领导者，抬高停火会谈＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivefvx3lxte91tdzzte9wemzyqxllvfvts0nc QZJFRTQ2QKDTM2VLVKVYSG5HCTHAUJF5BUSTAUX5RDBJZ1PNUV8YB2V5ZW9PMK5IIWHFIBWFZAHY3EG？OC = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”> Hamas声称领导人在以色列对多哈的罢工中幸存下来，正如特朗普所说的那样，我们试图警告卡塔尔 ＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> bbc 以色列攻击卡塔尔的哈马斯领导人，美国说它几乎没有警告＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 马克龙将塞巴斯蒂安·莱科努（SébastienLeCornu）选为法国的下一任总理 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 马克龙选择塞巴斯蒂安·莱科努（SébastienLecornu href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikgfbvv95cuxpahm2d2lpwmpkeg1eqlj0wunowlhttw9nqzlttmkxzzzvdvdvou1eu1e1eu1 u11eu0ttt2t2t2t2t2t2txtxt2nlte JSci1TN19QS1QyWnh3Vm1Rd21LY3R2R2hFWlRlYnJBb1U3UUxDVjhlLS03STJGdUR3b3dHRG02Vjk2NXZZbDBnR0Zjd01jOGhySDdhT05xLXdQdG0yTW9fdw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>意见|法国拒绝使捍卫欧洲所需的权衡取舍＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 法国总统伊曼纽尔·马克龙（Emmanuel Macron href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiigfbvv95cuxqtuxnwkrzrzt0k1cw05dfjmmg1yzztgoxstnpms11bwxeuvnfsxdotm5namq1z FhxeEtNWVlFbFRMSFlGYnpnM0dxU2pGVHpoUUp2czlhYk5aTWZ5WlR2ZHVLQ2J2dWM2WEZKTm14Zkt2YWFrcTJENDFEcnRPVVNQai1OTGkxYlpHZnc?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>法国政府再次倒塌。我们是怎么到达这里的，接下来是什么？＆nbsp;＆nbsp; cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxOOWF6M1pfLWlqZEg5UzBYVENQMTFZWXdzS2lRWHQ0anV3LVM0ZVgzLUNpQllXV3lNSDdlNWFubVlJU1YwWUJ DTJDCATNRTY1HRW9NYW1NCTHQZKPTR3DCDLI5V29DEG5TC2PRX2PRX2FKZXK3Y0HMD3Y0HMD3OYCC1PRH nhwktsagrgm0hsu0oyzwrgmu5jnkptvfdbnkqzrljfruvwwxdpxzjvcmnmdxjxjxblk？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> stoxx 600结束时，合并平衡法国动荡＆nbsp; reuters

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚在区域紧张局势中开设了非洲最大的大坝-NPR
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚在区域紧张局势的最大大坝＆nbsp; npr 埃塞俄比亚的骄傲 - 建造非洲最大的水力发电大坝 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiiwfbvv95cuxpdflfqzv4edffyfyfyn3nftvvcm19iqwzrqzrqzbdceluszbdceluszbdceluszbin0xzcetgjfxzxe1ogxnz L95U1HMRTGXCLA3BGFYA3HLU19UAAEVHBDMXV0RWBNCXZZGNBNLO0WS1HUGFLZHNIQVBTEVBTEVJ5OG9SA1PIZ05LSUDESLSUDESLFZU3NIT194NG1K1KCC3RKC3RKV3RKV3ARKV3AA4X2RBBBBBBB？ target =“ _ blank”>埃塞俄比亚打开非洲最大的水力发电大坝埃及抗议＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn> cnn 埃塞俄比亚向苦埃及反对派发射大量的水电大坝＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxNUTRUNXF2TzhQYWdEdlVFTktXVXRTVEFtM29lT2x2ZTVOVmpxbDVxR2gwY2JybDA1MFBWUWdsZEMxYVZfQzR ssdbuew9klxzyy1bxvxlnwnwnwndmzgxqwjbpqmnpdc1cmgr5mhzzv3lex2vcc2vcc2vertc4tfhjus 04V0NYDMF0WFBYMTFLDHRRTKKK3CTN5T1ZSWGHSCL81WM4TA2HVTVE0VLHJVURWVDG？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>埃塞俄比亚新的Mega-dam的承诺和危险

item.title: 尼泊尔议会因反腐败抗议而辞职后着火-BBC
item.description: 尼泊尔议会在PM辞职后着火了反腐败抗议＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 对于尼泊尔的抗议者来说href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilafbvv95cuxqddyznkd1mhfweknmekfbr2k3cxh5bjjqxzzzzizizizizizizizu2jqqrgnebnebnebnebduwelvtn1hodenananwlyedr sahpsblotrhbqdvjsue5bunfoqwltntlocgvv1cfnswxlwrlrhuna3t3hfa3nnd1hcqulmvmzqulmvmzqotjpcfvhcfvhc1vhc1vhc1vhc1vhc1ssshzytkddufpevpevpevpevtg4clc5ddrddrddrddrlmddrlmddrlmdddrlmddrlmd = oc = oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>抗议尼泊尔的社交媒体禁令越来越暴力，随着示威者在火上设置建筑物＆nbsp; ap news 演示警报：美国大使馆加德满都，尼泊尔 - 情况更新，2025年9月9日 ＆nbsp; nbsp; 美国。尼泊尔的使馆（.gov） 尼泊尔抗议活动暴露了公众愤怒的深度＆nbsp; 外交政策

item.title: 激进分子说，加沙援助船将测试突尼斯在突尼斯攻击以色列的封锁-CBS新闻
item.description: 激进分子说，加沙援助船将测试突尼斯在突尼斯攻击以色列的封锁＆nbsp; cbs news> cbs news 加沙弗洛蒂拉（Gaza Flotilla href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivefvx3lxte9kdwr0r2wr0r29odxdxmkpyrlllbblrv N3PCVLV3RMLCZLVXSFPSEV9IOUPZRTNSU0M2UWDZCTZ4DK9WAW51R2ZNNZBPNM16WNBXRWWNBXRWWWWW0AXA0MG？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>使用视频调查报告对加沙结构的植物群的罢工href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiywfbvv95cuxoaho4wwwjkym51uec3mejjy0 i3lwi1z0njruf3cw1ka2hscfhsd19ywhi2y2y2y3rvbmq4tvlxuwjhvlvpwpwpwpwpwpepwggy2swxjt2phqtgwqtgwtjbxyjbrq0xi lunlxmejxcgfidjnbnglqs3itdkntwldjamw2uk5ru2tyqy11y1y0f0uxiwdk9ix3f6u0dnovrid0dvq253me 05UE5UE5LUMTOZWZSDMR1B3CXCHK4Q2FIYZRKNDHOMU01NJDXZURQSUJVWEREBGLAAKQ3TJI3TJI3M2DVOA？ target =“ _ blank”> flotilla for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for for tunisian港口，当局拒绝罢工＆nbsp; greta thunberg flotilla说，加沙援助船在突尼斯袭击＆nbsp; 守护者
